timeline.bodyText: I thought requires transitive was only needed when the module is exposed in public API?
timeline.author: alzimmermsft

replies.bodyText: No, requires transitive allows client libraries to access it if they just add requires com.azure.core to their respective module-info.java. A few client libraries like Cosmos, Storage and Search are not explicitly adding requires com.fasterxml.jackson.dataformat.xml or requires  com.fasterxml.jackson.datatype.jsr310 which can be avoided with this change.
replies.author: srnagar
